metadata.title: CVE-2023-27560 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Math/PrimeField.php in phpseclib 3.x before 3.0.19 has an infinite loopwith composite primefields.

criterions.comment: ldap-account-manager: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
php-phpseclib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
